Core.Nodes

Class BinaryNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • Core.Nodes.BinaryNode

  • public class BinaryNode
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a node in a binary tree structure. Each node stores an integer value, references to its left and right child, and a balance factor (commonly used in AVL trees).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int balance
      Balance factor of the node (used in self-balancing trees like AVL).
      int data
      The value stored in this node.
      BinaryNode left
      Reference to the left child node.
      BinaryNode right
      Reference to the right child node.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BinaryNode(int data)
      Creates a binary node with no children.
      BinaryNode(int data, BinaryNode left, BinaryNode right)
      Creates a binary node with specified left and right children.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
